reviews.review_msg: She did not favour me and let me know it as often as possible-verbal attacks, condescension, and blatant insults. Others called her out on it. Unreasonable course load b/c she doesnt explain anything and you must go on assumptions of what she wants-dont trust what she says. I have never had anymark lower then an -A and my mark was a flat B.

My complaint with the content is based on the many hours required just looking for the articles. This hinders our time doing the extreme number of readings. Her mood swings are disturbing, pretending to be nice in one moment, then attaching someone in the next. If she decides to harass you look out. She has a mean streak..

Received 0 feedback on assignments throughout the whole course. Midterm included specific details that had no relevance to the course. During discussions he would interrogate students with extremely specific questions about readings that no one ever remembered. Very unclear grading criteria for all assignments. Hard marker.
